question: Claire has 12 jars of sprinkles in her pantry. Each jar of sprinkles can decorate 6 cupcakes. Claire wants to bake enough cupcakes to use up all of her sprinkles. If each rack holds 6 cupcakes, how many racks worth of cupcakes should she bake?
answer:
She has enough sprinkles for 12 * 6 = <<12*6=72>>72 cupcakes.
She needs 72 / 6 = <<72/6=12>>12 racks to bake all of the cupcakes.
#### 12
